data.name: Devilian: Awakened Pack
data.detailed_description:
Leap into the fight against Kavel's armies with a pack of boosts perfect for any Devilian, from those newly embracing their demonic roots to those who've long mastered the art of evil.

30-Day Patron Access

Special perks, bonuses, and more!

Character Slot

Grants an additional character slot!

Inventory Row (x4)

Expands your inventory by 32 slots total

Shining Expansion Rune

Expand your warehouse inventory

3-Day Bolton's Blessing

Grants 3-Days of +25% Gold, the time counts down even when logged out

3-Day Elara's Blessing

Grants 3-Days of +50% Experience, the time counts down even when logged out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
